name: Satellite Customs Control
desc: This structure represents the ability of the orbitting satellites to prevent unwanted entry from pathers.

name: Overgrown Nanoforge
desc:
An "overgrown nanoforge", or an industrial-grade nanoforge with disabled growth safeties. It will produce a significant amount of resources, as well as progressively create structures that will boost said resource production, at the cost of taking a structure slot and causing slight negatives effects.

Once this structure is destroyed, you will be given a special item that massively increases resource production (and fleet size + production budget, if on heavy industry) at the cost of increased hazard (and decreased ship quality, if on heavy industry). However, this structure can only be attacked once all growths are destroyed in tandem, making it a dedicated and expensive effort to do so.

Press F1 to view lore.

name: Nanoforge Growth
desc:
A "growth" sprouting from the nearby overgrown nanoforge. These "growths" will protect the core nanoforge from any incursions, requiring a dedicated culling effort to reach the inner sanctums.

It is for this reason so many of these nanoforges continue to churn. It is for this reason so many of these nanoforges continue their everlasting duties.

name: Astronomical Barrier Projector
desc:
Using surprisingly simple yet exotic techniques, this array of transmitters appears to transmit charged baryons across p-space using a phase clock, that which once expired causes the particles to jump into realspace and shroud the target in a protective field. 

Sadly, it seems only able to fire bursts strong enough to envelop a fleet of ships or a object of smaller size, though this is still greatly useful for operating inside an astronomically hostile environment.

Nullifies CR drain from terrain for all friendly/trade fleets in-system, as well as heavily mitigating terrain movement. Ideal for colonization of black hole systems.

name: Scaffolding Infrastructure
desc: While the titular infrastructure always existed, it was rarely, if ever, taken to this extent. Massive subsidies, incentives, and liberally placed construction outposts permits the host colony easy access to material, manpower, and location for new industry.

name: Aegis Missile System
desc: Thought to have been lost to the collapse, the aegis missile system is a proprietary network of modular IOBM missile silos, capable of delivering their payloads across planet and intra-orbit.
